# openCompleted

**Type Property**

The open has completed successfully.

## Declaration

```swift
static var openCompleted: Stream.Event { get }
```

## Constants

- **hasBytesAvailable**: The stream has bytes to be read.
- **hasSpaceAvailable**: The stream can accept bytes for writing.
- **errorOccurred**: An error has occurred on the stream.
- **endEncountered**: The end of the stream has been reached.
